channel.title: Packing on Take Two
channel.description: Recent content in Packing on Take Two

item.title: August 16, 2015
item.description: The last couple of weeks we have reported on events from the heights. There will be none of that this week. We are back to the mundane, the all-to-frequent chore of sorting and packing up. With less than two weeks to go before we leave PNG for furlough, it simply must get done now. I have often said that the thing most likely to cause me to stop being a missionary is the packing and moving.
